forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later in the day. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 8C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 46F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 52F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 47F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 12C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 11C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 52F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 46F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 11C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 53F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low near 45F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High near 55F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 42F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
